dialogue.htmlContent: You approach the gateway. The imps on guard duty nervously watch you approach, before asking if everything is ok. You reply in the affirmative, and they step back to let you pass.
You approach the gateway. The imps cruelly mock you as an oral slut, before crudely suggesting that you get down on your knees and service them again.
You approach the gateway. Imps guards have run away, leaving this area completely undefended.
If you choose to leave the fortress now, you can be sure that there'll be new guards at the gate when you return!
You approach the gateway. The imps on guard duty see that you're a demon, and look very nervous. Perhaps you could use this opportunity to command them to get out of your way?
You approach the gateway. The imps on guard duty challenge you, and say that the only way you're getting inside is by getting down on your knees and servicing them with your mouth...
You leave the fortress, and head back out into Submission.
You agree to perform oral on the imps in order to gain entry, and, to the sound of cackling laughter, you drop to your knees and prepare to put your mouth to use...
You tell the imps that you're hungry to service them with your mouth, and, dropping down on your knees before them, you beg for them to give you what you want.
You and [npc.name] agree to perform oral on the imps in order to gain entry, and, to the sound of cackling laughter, the two of you drop to your knees and prepare to put your mouths to use...
You tell the imps that you and [npc.name] are hungry to service them with your mouths, and, dropping down onto your knees before them, the two of you beg for them to give you what you both want.
The imps say what a slut you are, before letting you pass.
The imps say what sluts you are, before letting you pass.
You use your demonic status to intimidate the imps, who immediately stand down and say that you can enter.
You have defeated the guards. Now what to do with them before they run away?
You move the imps into position and prepare to have sex with them...
You gently move the imps into position and prepare to have sex with them...
You roughly force the imps into position and prepare to have sex with them...
You feel bad about beating the imps, and decide to submit to them...
You decide that you and [npc.name] should have sex with the imps...
You decide that you and [npc.name] should submit to the imps...
You decide to give [npc.name] to the imps, so that they can have some fun with [npc.herHim]...
You decide to let [npc.name] have sex with the imps, and step back to watch...
You are defeated. The imps start feeling you up...
You let the imps move you into position and start having sex with you...
You eagerly encourage the imps to move you into position and start having sex with you...
You desperately try to resist as the imps move you into position and start having sex with you...
You're finished with the guards. You wonder if you should take any of their items before they run off...
The imps are finished dominating you. Dragging you over to the other side of the cavern, they tell you to come back when you're wanting a good fuck again.
The imps are finished dominating you and [npc.name]. Dragging you both over to the other side of the cavern, they tell you to come back when you're wanting a good fuck again.
An empty, squalid courtyard. The main keep is over in one corner, but apart from that, there's nothing of interest inside the walls of this fortress.
Breaking out into a run, you and [npc.name] quickly launch yourselves into the air, before flying over the fortress's outer wall and swooping back down to land on the floor of the cavern beyond.

The keep is quite clearly occupied, as slivers of light shine out from cracks in the large wooden doors. You can also hear the occasional burst of laughter from a group of imps. If you were to enter, you'd better be ready for a fight...

Having defeated the ruler of this fortress, there's nobody living in the keep right now. The entire place is deserted, so there's nothing more to do except head back the way you came.

You get the feeling that [npc2.name] will return sooner or later...

The keep is quite clearly occupied, as slivers of light shine out from cracks in the large wooden doors. You can also hear the occasional burst of laughter from a group of imps.

As [npc.name] no longer considers you a threat, you could enter and say hello without risking a fight.

You enter the keep. There's a group of three female imps sitting around a table on the far side of the hall. At the head of this table sits a particularly slutty-looking succubus, who has light-purple skin, blonde, wavy hair, and blue eyes. Her huge, perky breasts are barely contained by the white tube-top she's wearing, through which her large nipples are clearly visible. Light-pink fishnet stockings and gloves cover her legs and forearms, and a pleated microskirt leaves her light-pink thong visible to anyone who glances down below her waist. To finish off her trashy look, she's adorned in gold jewellery of all kinds, and is wearing a heavy layer of make-up; the most noticeable of which is the pink lipstick that's coating her huge, cock-sucking lips.

This succubus leader is the first to notice your entrance, and calls out to her imps that they're about to have some fun. She says that she's desperate to have her pussy fucked, and after she's done with you, you'll #IF pc.hasPenis() #THEN get hard #IF pc.hasVagina() #THEN and wet #ENDIF #ELSE #IF pc.hasVagina() #THEN get wet #ELSE get aroused #ENDIF #ENDIF at even hearing the name '[npc2.name]'. She seems eager to seduce you into submitting to her, and you only have a moment in which to decide what to do...

You enter the keep. There's a group of three female imps sitting around a table on the far side of the hall. At the head of this table sits a particularly slutty-looking succubus, who has light-purple skin, blonde, wavy hair, and blue eyes. This succubus leader is the first to notice your entrance, and, recognising you from before, calls out to her imps that they're about to have some fun. She says that she's desperate to have her pussy fucked, and after she's done with you, you'll #IF pc.hasPenis() #THEN get hard #IF pc.hasVagina() #THEN and wet #ENDIF #ELSE #IF pc.hasVagina() #THEN get wet #ELSE get aroused #ENDIF #ENDIF at even hearing the name '[npc2.name]'. She seems eager to seduce you into submitting to her, and you only have a moment in which to decide what to do...

You enter the keep. There's a group of three female imps sitting around a table on the far side of the hall. At the head of this table sits a particularly slutty-looking succubus, who has light-purple skin, blonde, wavy hair, and blue eyes. Her huge, perky breasts are barely contained by the white tube-top she's wearing, through which her large nipples are clearly visible. To finish off her trashy look, she's adorned in gold jewellery of all kinds, and is wearing a heavy layer of make-up; the most noticeable of which is the pink lipstick that's coating her huge, cock-sucking lips.

The demon is the first to notice your entrance, and calls out a greeting as she recognises you. She asks if you're back to have some fun again...
You tell the succubus that you and [npc.name] were just checking for any signs of trouble, before taking your leave.
You answer the succubus's question in the affirmative, and, to the chorus of laughter from her gang of imps, obediently crawl under the table and prepare to start orally servicing her.

You answer the succubus's question in the affirmative, and, to the chorus of laughter from her gang of imps, both you and [npc.name] obediently crawl under the table and prepare to start orally servicing her.
Deciding that you have no chance again this succubus and her gang, you surrender. Within moments, a pair of imps are dragging you under the table, before pushing your face into her groin.

Deciding that you and [npc.name] have no chance again this succubus and her gang, you surrender. Within moments, a pair of imps are dragging the two of you under the table, before pushing your faces into her groin.
You tell [npc2.name] that you just want to talk for a moment. She stops to listen, but you can tell that she could attack at any moment...

The succubus and her imps are intimidated at the sight of your elemental. [npc.Name] tells you of the person who rules over all the imp gangs, who calls herself 'The Dark Siren'. A recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself, this demon is extremely powerful, and amuses herself by watching her imp followers fuck anyone who dares stand against her. [npc.Name] then gives you a key to the Siren's imp citadel, in exchange for you letting her leave.

You convince the succubus that you're on very good terms with your Lilin mother, who wouldn't hesitate to enslave her and make her your pet. [npc.Name] is duly intimidated, and agrees to leave the fortress if you'll spare her that fate.

[npc2.Name] then tells you of the one who rules all the imp gangs. Calling herself 'The Dark Siren', this demonic leader is a recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself. Possessing incredible arcane power, she amuses herself by watching her imp followers fuck anyone who dares stand against her. [npc.Name] then gives you a key to the Siren's imp citadel, in exchange for you letting her leave.

You ask if you can join [npc2.namePos] gang. The succubus says that 'The Dark Siren' is the only one who can accept new gang members. If you show your submission to the gang, she'll give you a key that will allow you to see this powerful demon leader. Submission involves orally servicing her.
You accept [npc2.namePos] terms, and, dropping down onto all fours, you crawl under the table and prepare to put your mouth to use...
You and [npc.name] accept the succubus's command, and, dropping down onto all fours, the two of you crawl under the table and prepare to put your mouths to use...

You draw attention to the fact that you are powerful enough to have a summoned elemental with you. The succubus and her imps are intimidated by the power it then displays.

A recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself, this demon is extremely powerful, and amuses herself by watching her imp followers fuck anyone who dares stand against her. [npc2.Name] then gives you a key to the Siren's imp citadel, in exchange for you letting her leave.

You summon your elemental, which intimidates the succubus and her gang. [npc2.Name] tells you of the person who rules over all the imp gangs, who calls herself 'The Dark Siren'. A recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself, this demon is extremely powerful, and amuses herself by watching her imp followers fuck anyone who dares stand against her. [npc2.Name] then gives you a key to the Siren's imp citadel, in exchange for you letting her leave.
You beat the gang. The succubus tells you of the Dark Siren, and she gives you a key to the imp citadel in exchange for letting her leave. Now to decide what to do with them...
You tell the gang to leave the fortress. They dash past you and flee.
You move to have sex with the defeated gang...
You move to have gentle sex with the defeated gang...
You move to have rough sex with the defeated gang...
You move to have sex with the defeated gang...

The succubus says that if you do end up joining the gang, you're welcome to have the job as her personal oral pet.

[npc2.Name] then tells you more of the person who rules over all the imp gangs, who calls herself 'The Dark Siren'. A recognised daughter of Lyssieth herself, this demon is extremely powerful, and amuses herself by watching her imp followers fuck anyone who dares stand against her.
[npc2.Name] gives you a key to the Siren's imp citadel, so that you can go and ask her about joining the gang.
You and [npc.name] prepare to move off and continue on your way once again. perhaps you could take some more of the gang's stuff first though...
The gang is finished with you, and throws you out into Submission...
The gang is finished with you and [npc.name], and throws the two of you out into Submission...
